name: Knight Of Summer Camp Beta 1.1
description:
A young boy goes to summer camp and discovers that it is overrun by bullies. Can you help save the other campers from them while filling out your sticker activity sheet?

This fun adventure has you exploring the camp as you assist in making other campers' lives easier. 

Controls Mobile/Gameboy

'up' arrow - moves up

'down' arrow - moves down

'left' arrow - moves left

'right' arrow - moves right

'select' button - opens up the menu

'A' button - interact with NPCs

'B' button - makes an attack 

Controls PC

'W' button or up arrow- moves up

'S' button or down arrow- moves down

'A' button or left arrow- moves left

'D' button or right arrow- moves right

'shift' button - opens up the menu

'enter' button 

'Z' button - interact with NPCs

'X' button - makes an attack
